name: Global Forum on Alzheimer’s and Dementia Research
content: Theme: “Enhancing improving Supporting professionals of Dementia and Alzheimer’s disease”. GT Health Care welcomes you to attend the Global Forum on Alzheimer’s disease and Dementia research during September 04-05, 2018 at Venice, Italy. We cordially invite all the participants who are interested in sharing their knowledge and research in the arena of Dementia and Alzheimer’s disease. The intending participants can confirm their participation by registering for the conference along with your colleagues. Avail the delegate early bird offer.
